item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Simple. Transparent. Secure

Banking Solutions

Products and services designed to help you reach your
financial goals.

Open Account Get in touch

Partners

Smart Banking

Real time Notifications

Your customer stay informed in real time with everything thats happening on his account: payments, transfer, advice. Get visibility on your customers' flows to anticipate their needs.

  • Cards that work all across the world.
  • No ATM fees. No minimum balance. No overdrafts.

Safe Investments

The Better Way to Save & Invest

Bankio helps over 2 million customers achieve their financial goals by helping them save and invest with ease. Put that extra cash to use without putting it at risk with Bankio.

  • Profitable to invest and Handy to manage
  • Highest Returns on your investments
Open your account from anywhere in the world

Solutions for Every Business Need.

Power up your business with a full-stack online bank account that fits your needs.

Checking Account

Choose from our checking options that allow you to earn interest, avoid fees, and easily manage your account.

Open Account

Savings Accounts

Choose from our checking options that allow you to earn interest, avoid fees, and easily manage your account.

Start Saving

Business Account

Choose from our checking options that allow you to earn interest, avoid fees, and easily manage your account.

Open Account

Banking at Your Fingertips

Your banking experience anytime, anywhere

Get your money moving with our simple to use, accessible mobile app. As good as a bank branch within your phone!

  • Bill Payments ,Funds Transfer ,QR payments
  • Credit card payments and Order food
Boost your savings with the right credit card

Access Endless Possibilities with Bankio Card

All your needs covered with a full range of credit and debit cards.

Get Started Now Get Started Now Get Started Now Get Started Now
Secured Cards
Balance Transfer
Travel
Cashback
Secured Cards
Balance Transfer
Travel
Cashback

Ready to make the leap?

Let us help you.

Open Account Get in touch

Financial Planning

Let's plan your finances the right way

Lending that doesn't weigh you down.We know how hard is it to start something new, thats why we have the perfect plan for you.

Apply for a loan

Home Loans

  • Lowest interest rates
  • Fast Loan Processing

Car Loans

  • Competitive rates
  • Quick Easy

Education Loans

  • Pay back conveniently
  • Fast Loan Processing

Business Loans

  • Easy Approvals
  • Full Assistance

Need a Personalized Solution?

Get in touch with us, and we will help you to create the right one for your business or personal needs. Apply for a loan
Testimonials

Don't take our word for it, take theirs

Take a look at our past customers success stories. Our goal is to help you grow

I love Bankio, they are the best

Its been 2 years since I found Bankio, and its such a relief as a small business owner to not worry about unnecessary fees. I lost my credit card once, and the service was so prompt that I was back to work the next day!

Sophie Moore
United Kingdom

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
About Us

Your ally in achieving ambition beyond borders

We understand that with global ambition, comes global challenges, and we are here to bridge the gap by offering seamless cross-border financial services. Consider us your friendly digital guide to all things finance, helping you make the most of your money.

0 % Customer satisfaction 0 M Monthly active users 0 K New Users per week
Our core values

Our values help us set the bar for good banking high.

Our values define us. They guide us in building and improving our product, hiring teammates, and serving our customers.

Customer First

We aim to provide our customers with top-notch service that helps them grow their business and put their best foot forward.

Passion over Pedigree

item.title: Account
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
The right financial help, at the right time

An Account You Can Truly Bank Upon

Change the way you manage your money.We have a fine range of accounts to help you manage your finances seamlessly

Apply Now
Open your account from anywhere in the world

An account, designed for you

Power up your business and personal life with a full-stack online bank account that fits your needs.

No Minimum Balance Required

Taking the first step towards your dreams should be a breeze, not a burden.

No Monthly Account Fees

So that every month, you can focus on investing in your ambitions

No SSN Needed

All we need is basic information about you, your visa and passport

Our trust is built on your security

We keep your money safe with FDIC Insurance worth up to $250,000 through our partner bank.

Our trust is built on your security

We keep your money safe with FDIC Insurance worth up to $250,000 through our partner bank.

Our trust is built on your security

We keep your money safe with FDIC Insurance worth up to $250,000 through our partner bank.

Open your account from anywhere in the world

Solutions for Every Business Need.

Power up your business with a full-stack online bank account that fits your needs.

Checking Account

Choose from our checking options that allow you to earn interest, avoid fees, and easily manage your account.

Open Account

Savings Accounts

Choose from our checking options that allow you to earn interest, avoid fees, and easily manage your account.

Start Saving

Business Account

Choose from our checking options that allow you to earn interest, avoid fees, and easily manage your account.

Open Account
If you have question,we have answer

Frequently asked questions

Get answers to all questions you have and boost your knowledge so you can save, invest and spend smarter. See all questions here!

If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

item.title: Business Loan
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Business loan without hidden fees & charges

A business Loan, Just as You Need It

Get business loans approved within days with transparent lending criteria and transparent processes.

  • Same day approval and multiple funding options
  • Access loans without origination fees
  • Borrow up to $250,000
Apply for a business loan
A business loan innovator at your service

An inexpensive and flexible business loan on your own terms

We understand entrepreneurs and the corporate world with its many challenges and opportunities.We dont waste time on unnecessary paperwork and do most things electronically. Its no wonder that we are among the most popular business loan providers in the Bankio.

Loan Calculator

Choose the business loan amount that you need ($1,000 to $250,000) and the payment period (618 months) that suits you best.

Monthly instalment of $9.00
Monthly instalment of $18.00
Monthly instalment of $36.00
Apply for a business load
Security is our top priority

You're safe with us

Your business data is important to get financing. We keep your data safe with bank-level security and 256-bit encryption.

Apply for a loan today. Your new car is waiting for you

Get business loans approved within days with transparent lending criteria and transparent processes.

Apply for a loan

Please fill the form below. We will get in touch with you within 1-2 business days, to request all necessary details

    1,000,000+

    Business owners across all 50 states

    3.5x

    More likely to get approved with Bankio

    110,000+

    Approvals for only small businesses

    Numbers said more than words

    We know how to help businesses like yours

    Business loan options of all shapes and sizes.we don't believe in surprises

    A Better Way to Get Loan

    How it works

    It's easier than you think. Follow the following simple easy steps

    1. Fill the form

    Fill basic information for us to get in touch with you.

    2. Get pre-qualified

    Verify your ID and get on a quick video call with a loan specialist.

    3. Send documents

    Fill basic information for us to get in touch with you.

    4. Get a loan

    Make smart spending decisions on the spot. Our budgeting too

    Apply for a business loan
    If you have question,we have answer

    Frequently asked questions

    Get answers to all questions you have and boost your knowledge so you can save, invest and spend smarter. See all questions here!

    If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

    If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

    If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

    If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

    If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

    If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

    Ready to get started?

    It only takes a few minutes to register your FREE Bankio account. Open an Account

item.title: Education Loans
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Varied offers for boundless ambitions

Educations loans for everyone

Make the smart choice. Get education loan offers at great interest rates

  • No SSN or credit history required
  • Checking for rate won't impact credit score
  • No prepayment fees
Apply for a Educations loan

We believe you are more than a number.

0 M+ Loans Given 0 M+ Customers Served 0 Countries Apply for a Education loan
A Better Way to Get Loan

How it works

It's easier than you think. Follow the following simple easy steps

1. Fill the form

Fill basic information for us to get in touch with you

2. Get pre-qualified

Verify your ID and get on a quick video call with a loan specialist.

3. Send documents

Upload your documents on the Bankio app and get approved in

4. Get a Loan

Make smart spending decisions on the spot. Our budgeting too

Let's Calculate Your Loan Offer

    Period
    Have you already secured your student loan?
    Loan & Behold

    Our Products

    Whether youre starting college or graduating with student debt, were the only Bank that has you covered for your entire student loan journey.

    Student Loans

    Stress-free loans that let you focus on school without worrying how to pay for it. We offer undergraduate, graduate, MBA, dental, and medical loans.

    Refinancing

    Simplify your student loans and pay off debt more quickly by refinancing. It only takes minutes to see how much money you can save.

    Quick & easy Education loan

    Take One Step Closer to Your Dream.

    Get Education loans approved within days with transparent lending criteria and transparent processes.

    Apply for a loan

    Please fill the form below. We will get in touch with you within 1-2 business days, to request all necessary details

      Testimonials

      Trusted by 2000+ Partners & Customers

      Take a look at our past customers success stories. Our goal is to help you grow

item.title: Home Loans
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Helping you own your home sooner

A simple way to buy a home or refinance

Whether youre building, investing or simply fixing up your current home, a housing loan is the best way to hammer in the first nail to your dream home.

  • Free deposits and withdrawals
  • Your savings are protected at all times
  • Be eligible for a dividend, when paid
Apply for a home loan

Mortgage lending

Our experienced loan officers look forward to helping you finance the home of your dreams!

Apply for a Home loan Get in touch
Why Bankio is a great financing option for you.

Great benefits from Bankio

Building or buying, for yourself or to invest, we have the home loan for you.

Simple Application Process

item.title: Car Loans
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Why should you demand a rifa loan

Smarter car loans. Designed for you.

Bankio expands access to fair credit with a simple and fast loan application that looks at you not just your credit score.A flexible hassle-free financing facility that enables you to own your dream car

Apply Now

Apply for a loan today. Your new car is waiting for you

Dont just dream, get your dream car.Bankio offers a flexible and hassle-free financing facility that enables you to own your dream car and provides financing up to 85% of the value of your desired car.

Apply for a loan

Please fill the form below. We will get in touch with you within 1-2 business days, to request all necessary details

    A Better Way to Get Loan

    How it works

item.title: Personal Loans
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Meet your financial needs

Borrow better for the planned and unexpected

Flexible and dependable, personal loans can be used to cover almost any expense.Break big expenses into manageable payments

  • 100% Safe & Secure
  • Instant Process
Apply for a Educations loan

We believe you are more than a number.

0 M+ Loans Given 0 M+ Customers Served 0 Countries Apply for a Education loan
A Better Way to Get Loan

How it works

It's easier than you think. Follow the following simple easy steps

1. Fill the form

Fill basic information for us to get in touch with you

2. Get pre-qualified

Verify your ID and get on a quick video call with a loan specialist.

3. Send documents

Upload your documents on the Bankio app and get approved in

4. Get a Loan

Make smart spending decisions on the spot. Our budgeting too

Loan Calculator

Choose the business loan amount that you need ($1,000 to $250,000) and the payment period (618 months) that suits you best.

Monthly instalment of $9.00 Monthly instalment of $18.00 Monthly instalment of $36.00 Monthly instalment of $36.00 Apply for a business load
  • No SSN or credit history required
  • Checking for rate wont impact credit score
  • No prepayment fees

Weve helped more than 15,000 customers

Our goal is to help you grow. 4.4 out of 5 based on 155 reviews

Sed arcu tortor, feugiat sit amet accumsan ac, maximus quis quam.vitae Integer ultrices elit.

Faruk Ahmed

Sed arcu tortor, feugiat sit amet accumsan ac, maximus quis quam.vitae Integer ultrices elit.

Faruk Ahmed

Sed arcu tortor, feugiat sit amet accumsan ac, maximus quis quam.vitae Integer ultrices elit.

Faruk Ahmed
dont have an SSN yet there is no need to worry

Be Eligible Without SSN or Credit History

We look at holistic profile of individuals, and do no rely only on traditional credit history. We look at all indications of financial responsibility.

  • Current employment or employability
  • Education
  • Financial Behavior
Apply for a Educations loan
Feel free to pay as early as you want

Pay early without Any Extra Cost

No prepayment penalty for early payment, pay as soon as you want.

  • Fast and Easy
  • Early Loan Repaymnet
  • No Hidden Fees
Apply for a Educations loan
Easy access to all your personal needs

Loans, minus the paperwork and haggling.

We make borrowing uncomplicated by setting clear criteria that you can view beforehand to decide if we fit your needs.

  • Competitively priced and tailored for you.
  • Get an overview on your loans in the app.
Apply for a Personal loan
Quick & easy Education loan

Take One Step Closer to Your Dream.

Get Personal loans approved within days with transparent lending criteria and transparent processes.

Apply for a loan

Please fill the form below. We will get in touch with you within 1-2 business days, to request all necessary details

    If you have question,we have answer

    Frequently asked questions

    Get answers to all questions you have and boost your knowledge so you can save, invest and spend smarter. See all questions here!

    If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

item.title: Card
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Add value to your life

Global Expansion Made Easy

Accelerate your ambitions with the Bankio Debit and Credit Cards that comes with no annual fee, a high credit limit.

Apply Now
Boost your savings with the right credit card

Access Endless Possibilities With Bankio Card

All your needs covered with a full range of credit and debit cards.

No annual fees

Most good things in life are free. We value your hard-earned money too much to charge an annual fee.

No foreign exchange fees

You may be in the different country, but part of you will always be home. Save as you swipe in two countries

No SSN Needed

Good credit is for everyone. We just need your basic personal information, visa and passport for identification .

Rewards So Awesome, You'll be Spoiled for Choice

5%-10%

Cashback

10k+

Merchants

Giftcards

For your friends & family

Apply Now

No Security Deposit needed

For us trust is not just a word but action. you dont need a security deposit to get a high credit limit with Bankio.

A Credit Limit that Feels Unlimited

Your journey to greatness shouldnt be confined by credit limits! Which is why we provide a high credit limit.

Feel Great When You Spend

The Bankio Card offers amazing rewards and benefits on our partner stores.

Grow Your Confidence

Choose the Card that Matches Your Needs

We have a fine range of accounts to help you manage your finances seamlessly

Get Started Now Get Started Now Get Started Now Get Started Now Get Started Now Get Started Now

Now it's time to switch old ways to track expenses smarter

What are you waiting for? It's time to get started.

Apply Now
If you have question,we have answer

Frequently asked questions

Get answers to all questions you have and boost your knowledge so you can save, invest and spend smarter. See all questions here!

If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

Ready to get started?

It only takes a few minutes to register your FREE Bankio account. Open an Account

item.title: Affiliate
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Give Credit, Get Credit!

Refer ------ Reward ------ Repeat

$25

Per Friend

Refer Now!
Make money through your network

What goes around, comes around, and we take it seriously!

You got credit, now its time to give your friends some credit too. With Bankios Refer-a-Friend program, you can earn a $25 referral reward when your friend activates a Bankio credit card using your link. Whats more, your friend gets $25 credited to their Bankio credit card balance too!

Rewarding Commissions

Choose from our checking options that allow you to earn interest, avoid fees, and easily manage your account.

Open Account

Savings Accounts

Choose from our checking options that allow you to earn interest, avoid fees, and easily manage your account.

Start Saving

Business Account

Choose from our checking options that allow you to earn interest, avoid fees, and easily manage your account.

Open Account
Refer Bankio credit card and earn $25!

How it Works

Its easier than you think. Follow the following simple easy steps

Share Your Unique Referral Link With Friends

Share Your Unique Referral Link With Friends

Share Link

Your friends have to sign up and activate their Bankio Credit Card

Both you and your friend get $25 credited to your Bankio credit card balance!

Congratulation

Youve Earned

$25

Even better, your friends will earn $25 too!

Invite Your Friends & Earn $25 for Each Referral

Sign in to your account for your personalized link and share it with friends. Once they apply for a Bankio account, you both get paid!

Refer a friend now!
If you have question,we have answer

Frequently asked questions

Get answers to all questions you have and boost your knowledge so you can save, invest and spend smarter. See all questions here!

If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

Ready to get started?

It only takes a few minutes to register your FREE Bankio account. Open an Account

item.title: Remittance
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Simple. Transparent. Secure

Send Remittance Back Home

Competitive rates, low fees, and the most reliable money transfer convenient way.You can receive money from abroad directly.

Open your account from anywhere in the world

An account, designed for you

Power up your business and personal life with a full-stack online bank account that fits your needs.

No Minimum Balance Required

Taking the first step towards your dreams should be a breeze, not a burden.

No Monthly Account Fees

So that every month, you can focus on investing in your ambitions

No SSN Needed

All we need is basic information about you, your visa and passport

Payments without borders

Freedom to Received Money Anywhere.

Get the best rates when sending money abroad right in the app.

Always at Your Fingertips

Things come up. Money needs to be sent in a pinch. With the Bankio apps remittance feature, sending money back home only takes a few taps.

Get the exchange rate right time

The cost of sending money abroad is constantly shifting. But with the Bankio app, youll always know the exchange rate and exactly how much remittance costs you.

No additional fees. Ever

Exchange rates already make remitting money back home more expensive. Stilt will never charge you anything extra to send money to your family. Ever.

Send with speed

When you send money abroad with the Bankio apps remittance feature, your payments arrive instantly. No waiting and no instant transfer-fees. get 24/7 support.

Learn why Bankio is the right choice for you

Send money from the comfort of home

You can deposit money directly into someones bank account. This way, they dont even have to leave their house either!

Security is our top priority

You're safe with us

Your business data is important to get financing. We keep your data safe with bank-level security and 256-bit encryption.

Testimonials

Trusted by 2000+ Partners & Customers

Take a look at our past customers success stories. Our goal is to help you grow

Frequently asked questions

Get answers to all questions you have and boost your knowledge so you can save, invest and spend smarter. See all questions here!

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Get in touch with us.

Fill up the form and our team will get back to you within 24 hours

    Open your account from anywhere in the world

    An account, designed for you

    Power up your business and personal life with a full-stack online bank account that fits your needs.

    Sales

    sales@rifa.com

    Help & Support

    supports@rifa.com

    Media & Press

    media@rifa.com

    If you have question,we have answer

    Frequently asked questions

    Get answers to all questions you have and boost your knowledge so you can save, invest and spend smarter. See all questions here!

    If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

item.title: Account Details
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Secure & Grow Your Savings

Savings Accounts Made for You

Helping you save for your goals sooner, with accounts free from account keeping, management, and annual fees.
  • Free deposits and withdrawals
  • Your savings are protected at all times
  • Be eligible for a dividend, when paid

Save With Us

Bankios range of savings account offers tailor made saving solutions for you Open Account Get in touch

item.title: Product
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Build the future You See for Yourself

Enjoy The Freedom To Dream Big

Fulfil your dreams with our loan products.Money shouldnt just work for some of us. It should work for all of us.

Apply Now

Financial Planning

Let's plan your finances the right way

Lending that doesn't weigh you down.We know how hard is it to start something new, thats why we have the perfect plan for you.

Apply for a loan

Home Loans

  • Lowest interest rates
  • Fast Loan Processing

Car Loans

  • Competitive rates
  • Quick Easy

Education Loans

  • Pay back conveniently
  • Fast Loan Processing

Business Loans

  • Easy Approvals
  • Full Assistance

Need a Personalized Solution?

All your needs covered with a full range of credit and debit cards. Apply for a loan
If you have question,we have answer

Frequently asked questions

Get answers to all questions you have and boost your knowledge so you can save, invest and spend smarter. See all questions here!

If your card is missing, let us know immediately. Well block your card right away send over a new one on the same day.To report a lost or stolen card, call us at (406) 555-0120.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: rifa
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://titu.softivus.com/rifa.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

<label> Your message (optional) [textarea your-message] </label>
[submit "Submit"] [_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] <admin@titu.softivus.com> From: [your-name] [your-email] Subject: [your-subject]
Message Body: [your-message]
-- This is a notification that a contact form was submitted on your website ([_site_title] [_site_url]). [_site_admin_email] Reply-To: [your-email]
